The Basics

Lukas Burk

tRakt.Rmd

Preamble: The trakt.tv API and this package

Getting data from trakt.tv

1. Loading packages and trakt.tv credentials

library(tRakt)

That’s all you need to to for basic things. If you’re planning a larger project with lots and lots of data retrieval, you might want to create your own API app on trakt.tv and use trakt_credentials to set your client id.

2. Find things

Via direct search

# Text search
trakt.search("Game of Thrones", type = "show")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 9
#>   type  score title          year trakt slug          tvdb   imdb     tmdb 
#>   <chr> <dbl> <chr>         <int> <chr> <chr>         <chr>  <chr>    <chr>
#> 1 show   1000 Game of Thro…  2011 1390  game-of-thro… 121361 tt09449… 1399
# Search by explicit ID
trakt.search.byid("121361", id_type = "tvdb", type = "show")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 9
#>   type  score title          year trakt slug          tvdb   imdb     tmdb 
#>   <chr> <dbl> <chr>         <int> <chr> <chr>         <chr>  <chr>    <chr>
#> 1 show   1000 Game of Thro…  2011 1390  game-of-thro… 121361 tt09449… 1399

Via whatever’s popular(ish)

Another scenario would be that you’re not necessarily interested in some specific media item, but rather a collection of items that fulfill certain criteria, like being popular on trakt.tv and maybe being from a specific period or genre and whatnot. While you can also filter trakt.search by other criteria, it’s maybe more useful to filter, let’s say, the most watched movies of the past week by the release year of the movie.

# The 5 most popular shows
trakt.popular(type = "shows", limit = 5)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 7
#>   title                year trakt slug                tvdb   imdb     tmdb 
#>   <chr>               <int> <chr> <chr>               <chr>  <chr>    <chr>
#> 1 Game of Thrones      2011 1390  game-of-thrones     121361 tt09449… 1399 
#> 2 Breaking Bad         2008 1388  breaking-bad        81189  tt09037… 1396 
#> 3 The Walking Dead     2010 1393  the-walking-dead    153021 tt15202… 1402 
#> 4 The Big Bang Theory  2007 1409  the-big-bang-theory 80379  tt08982… 1418 
#> 5 Sherlock             2010 19792 sherlock            176941 tt14755… 19885
# The 10 most watched (during the past week) movies from 1990-2000
trakt.watched(type = "movies", period = "weekly", years = c(1990, 2000))
#> # A tibble: 10 x 9
#>    watcher_count play_count collected_count title  year trakt slug  imdb 
#>            <int>      <int>           <int> <chr> <int> <int> <chr> <chr>
#>  1           796       1062             124 Toy …  1995   705 toy-… tt01…
#>  2           697        930             108 The …  1994  4242 the-… tt01…
#>  3           669        892             134 Alad…  1992   655 alad… tt01…
#>  4           641        855             153 The …  1999   481 the-… tt01…
#>  5           549        732             106 Toy …  1999   706 toy-… tt01…
#>  6           433        578             110 Pulp…  1994   554 pulp… tt01…
#>  7           423        564              91 The …  1994   234 the-… tt01…
#>  8           405        540              76 Tita…  1997   475 tita… tt01…
#>  9           390        521              69 The …  1993  4765 the-… tt01…
#> 10           375        501              94 Forr…  1994     9 forr… tt01…
#> # … with 1 more variable: tmdb <int>
